Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are fuel cells made of ceramics.
Titulo: Development of multilayer imprint process for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To increase the SOFC energy density, we developed an SOFC with a wavy electrolyte layer.
Titulo: Development of multilayer imprint process for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As a wavy electrolyte has a larger reaction surface area than a flat electrolyte, a higher energy density could be obtained.
Titulo: Development of multilayer imprint process for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Our proposed process is named micro-powder imprint (mu PI) with a multilayer imprint process that is useful for fabricating a microscale pattern on a ceramic sheet such as an SOFC electrolyte layer.
Titulo: Development of multilayer imprint process for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: mu PI is based on nanoimprint lithography; therefore, it also exhibits the same advantages of high resolution and mass productivity.
Titulo: Development of multilayer imprint process for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The starting material for mu PI is a compound sheet containing ceramic powder and binder materials consisting of thermoplastic resin.
Titulo: Development of multilayer imprint process for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, two different sheets were stacked into one sheet as a multilayer sheet for the mu PI process to form a wavy compound sheet.
Titulo: Development of multilayer imprint process for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As the initial state of the stacked sheet, including the mechanical properties of each layer, affects the final wavy shape, we changed the material composition.
Titulo: Development of multilayer imprint process for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As a result, the SOFCs unit cell with a wavy electrolyte was fabricated.
Titulo: Development of multilayer imprint process for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Note that the anode layer was formed at the same time.
Titulo: Development of multilayer imprint process for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: After adding the cathode layer, we succeeded in preparing a complete cell for testing power generation.
Titulo: Development of multilayer imprint process for solid oxide fuel cells
